home.homeIntroduction: A collectibles project for extreme sports enthusiasts, with dog as the main character, contains eight extreme sports as design elements of NFT. a variety of extreme sports scenes, colors, characteristics, the total collection of 30,000. through the pledge of NFT to obtain dog food to participate in community activities and construction.

header.inviterTip: Please enter the your referee’s address to continue.

mint.mintIntroduction: Minting Eternal Doges needs ETH and Pass. Use advanced pass to get rare NFTs.

auction.auctionIntroduction: The Eternal doge club auction has started and will end on May 3, 2022 at 12:00 PM. Bidders can bid as much ETH as they want in their initial bid, and have the option to increase their bid. The amount of NFT for sale and the duration of the auction are fixed. At the end of the auction, the liquidation price will be determined and successful bidders who bid above the liquidation price will receive NFT and a refund of any ETH balance remained. Unsuccessful bids below the liquidation price will receive a full refund. Share Eternal Doge Club with your friends to mint and get a fascinating ETH bonus.

pledge.withdrawTip: A certain percentage of withdrawals may be burned, please confirm before continue.

lottery.explain1: 1. You can use dog treat or EDDC to draw, and each draw consumes 100 dog treat or 100 EDDC.
lottery.explain2: 2. The result of the draw is chosen randomly, the draw reward will be issued to your draw account immediately, you need to collect it manually to your balance account.
lottery.explain3: 3. The probability of dog treat draw is as follows:
lottery.explain3_1: a) 30% probability of drawing EDDC worth 0.9U.
lottery.explain3_2: b) 20% probability of drawing 1.5U worth of EDDC.
lottery.explain3_3: c) 10% chance of winning 2U worth of EDDC.
lottery.explain4: 4. The probability of winning an EDDC is as follows:
lottery.explain4_1: a) 30% chance of winning 80 EDDC worth of ETH.
lottery.explain4_2: b) 19.7% chance of winning 100 EDDC worth of ETH.
lottery.explain4_3: c) 0.3% chance of winning a Pass Card Premium.
lottery.explain4_4: d) 50% chance of not winning the lottery.
lottery.explain5: 5. 50% of the dog treat consumed by non-users will be awarded to the user with the highest ranking of invitation contribution.

market.description: PASS card is a mandatory material to mint Eternal Doge NFTs. You may mint rare NFTs by using the advanced pass, rare NFTs will be distributed randomly after Mint.

faq.explain1_1: 1. Space auction participants can bid on any eth not less than 0.1 and have the option to increase their bids. The final price is calculated at the end of the auction using an algorithm that is built into the contract. Each bidder can receive multiple NFTs based on their bids and final price. Sending NFTs ensures fair distribution.
faq.explain1_2: Example 1: You bid 1ETH, after the auction ends, the final price is 0.15ETH/pc, your address will receive 6 NFTs and a refund of 0.1ETH
faq.explain1_3: Example 2: You bid 0.1ETH, after the auction ends, the final price is 0.15ETH/pc, your address will receive a refund of 0.1ETH
faq.explain1_4: 2. How many ETH do I need to put in?
faq.explain1_5: To ensure that the NFT can be auctioned, please submit ETH above the clearing price, multiple bids are allowed, and the sum of the bids up to the last bid will be calculated for counting.
faq.explain1_7: You can NOT cancel your bid in a smart contract, but the remaining ETH and unsuccessful auction wins will be returned to your account.
faq.explain1_9: You can see the current number of successful bidders and unsuccessful bidders.
faq.explain2_1: 1. Introduction to the public casting function.
faq.explain2_2: 1) must have a pass card and a certain amount of ETH
faq.explain2_3: 2) Enter the casting interface on the official website
faq.explain2_4: 3) The maximum amount of NFT purchase is the maximum amount of holding an advanced or normal pass card
faq.explain2_5: 4) consume the pass card to complete the casting
faq.explain2_6: 2. How does the price of participating in casting NFT increase?
faq.explain3_2: 1) senior pass card can participate in the synthesis of high rarity NFT, pledge can produce more dog food
faq.explain3_3: 2) Ordinary pass card can participate in the synthesis of ordinary rarity NFT
faq.explain3_4: 2. How to get the pass card?
faq.explain4_1: 1. How to participate in the staking?
faq.explain4_7: 2. How to get dog treat earnings?
faq.explain4_8: 1) Hold NFT, participate in staking, and get the income once every 24 hours
faq.explain4_9: 2) Participate in the community incentive, invite friends to stake, you can get additional income
faq.explain4_10: 3. What are the different rarities of NFT and the different amounts of dog food you can get from staking?
faq.explain4_13: 1) 00:00 snapshot of staked nft data for the day
faq.explain4_15: 3) The earnings will be paid at 24:00 on the same day
faq.explain4_17: 1) Incentive program introduction: Invite friends to participate in staking, you will get extra dog treat reward from Eternal Doge Club
faq.explain4_19: ① Additional incentive calculation rules (Sunline): Those who contribute to the invitation will be able to get additional dog treat from their own contribution to the invitation team.
faq.explain4_20: ② Incentive payment time: 02:00 the next day
faq.explain5_2: In the function opened by Xdoge not long ago, you can get dog food by pledging NFT and accumulate a certain amount of dog food to participate in the lottery.
faq.explain5_3: 2、What are the rewards in the raffle center?
faq.explain5_4_3: Thanks for participating (can be done another way)
faq.explain5_6: 3、What is the difference between single and multiple lottery participation?
faq.explain5_7: Winning is a probability event, the probability of winning multiple times is greater than single times
faq.explain5_8: 4、How do I get a dog tag?
faq.explain5_9: The only way to get dog tags is to participate in the lottery.
faq.explain5_11: Dog tags are not an investment, It is the fuel that drives the entire Xdoge ecosystem. no IDO, no VC allocations. Xdoge will find its price through the free market.
faq.explain6_2: 1) Weekly ranking introduction: participate in the community incentive program, invite new friends to buy NFT, will record 10% of the total value of all NFT sold each week ETH into the weekly prize pool, through the contribution score each person in the week to calculate the ranking, get the corresponding bonus proportion of ETH rewards
faq.explain6_3: 2) Contribution score calculation rules: weighted score to get the bonus ETH, the weight comes from the contribution of direct fission project promotion, the overall team's promotion co-donation, strong associated with their own level. This results in the overall contribution as the weighting factor of the ranking.
faq.explain6_6: 1) Total ranking introduction: Invite friends to stake NFT and participate in the activities of the ecology, in the lottery game, we will not win 50% of the dog food consumed by the players to destroy, the other 50% into the staking pool, through the ranking calculation ranking, the distribution of pool rewards
faq.explain6_7: 2) contribution score calculation rules: weighted score to get the proportion of the overall loss of points by the system players, the weight comes from the contribution of the direct fission project promotion, the overall team's promotion of the total contribution, strong associated with their own level. So the overall contribution as a weighting coefficient of the ranking.
